content.body: last meeting someone had a data point on JS/TS usage by number of pull requests or pushes on GH or something like that.  does anyone remember the specifics on that one, or whose slide deck that was?

Chris de Almeida: i had linked to GH popularity rankings from 2022 in my slides. the 2024 numbers just came out and highlights the JS->TS trend: https://github.blog/news-insights/octoverse/octoverse-2024/#:~:text=notably%2C%20javascript%20still%20ranks%20first%20for%20code%20pushes%20alone.
content.formatted_body: Chris de Almeida: i had linked to GH popularity rankings from 2022 in my slides. the 2024 numbers just came out and highlights the JS->TS trend: https://github.blog/news-insights/octoverse/octoverse-2024/#:~:text=notably%2C%20javascript%20still%20ranks%20first%20for%20code%20pushes%20alone.

content.body: i don't know what their methodology is exactly. it sounds like some combination of pushes, commits, etc
* i don't know what their methodology is exactly. it sounds like some combination of pushes, PRs, etc
